Html:
First of all, Let me just say You have done some really easy life for me and others.. This wrapper has saved me so much work.. Thank you so much, Michael!

Now..

I was just wondering whats the easiest way to achieve isKeyDown for the Tilde Key.. Thats the key above TAB and left to 1 Key on a regular keyboard?

I didn't find it in the virtual keys (browsed all of them and looked carefully at the intelisence.. Nada.. Have I missed it?

Case its not there.. how can I achieve it by value and get a key-down Boolean when it is pressed?

 

Thanks again.

I appreciate your concern,

Shabi

OEM3 is the answer..

Sorry I made a fuss.. feel so silly now :)

 

Tanks again, So amazingly easy and ordered..

Shabi
